channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Hello I have decided im just going to format my pc to get rid of the virus and start freash but im not sure about how I can do this. I have all the CD's I need just don't know where to start.
Here is the list of the CD's:
1)Drivers and utilities (Device drivers, diagnostics and utilities, computer documents) 2)Operating system (Windows XP) 3)Drivers and utilities (Drivers, diagnostics and utilities, online documentation, modem and hold, BVRP phone tools) 4)Application (Applications) 5)Application (Applications) 6)Application (Antivirus software, support software, mulitmedia software, internet software) 7)Drivers and utilities (Dell all-in-one center, dell printer solution center, dell phone editor, dell image expert, ABBYY fine reader, fax software, user's guide)
Thanks alot for any help you can give.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Legend_Of_Slayer Legend Of Slayer
item.description:
@Legend_Of_Slayer wrote:

thanks alot for your help. Im sorry for posting soo much for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Boot up from your XP cd, from there on it’s all pretty straight forward if you read everything. Basically you delete the partition, make a new one, and format it.

Read full topic
